title: Broken Illusions
description: *WARNING: Due to sexual situations and adult content, this dark and disturbing psychological thriller is not intended for readers under the age of 18, and anyone who is unable to read books containing the following issues: kidnapping, murder, graphic rape, and extreme violence.*  Jude Macknight is gone forever, and I can finally start my new life with Dustin Brannon. But it's not so easy to move on.  When I close my eyes at night, I still see Jude's face. And sometimes, I swear I feel his presence. When will he stop haunting me? And when will I stop waiting for the other shoe to drop?  This is the breathtaking conclusion to the His Agenda serial.
author: Dori Lavelle
